channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Never Underestimate' Erling Haaland, Says Man City coach Pep Guardiola
item.description: Manager Pep Guardiola blamed Erling Haaland's goal drought on Man City having to "create more chances."

item.title: 2026 Super Bowl Odds: Back Sam Darnold to Win Big Game's MVP
item.description: The Super Bowl MVP typically goes to a quarterback, and Will Hill is backing one signal-caller to take home the trophy in Santa Clara.

item.title: 2025-26 Women's March Madness Odds: UConn Holds Steady as Clear Favorite
item.description: Will any team upend the UConn women on their quest for their second consecutive hoops title? Here are the latest odds.

item.title: 2026 NFL Coaching/GM Tracker: Commanders Find DC on Vikings' Staff
item.description: The coaching carousel for the 2026 offseason is about to get moving. Here are the latest news and rumors from around the NFL!

item.title: Best Sportsbook Promos & Bonus Bets - January 2026 Top Offers
item.description: Discover the best sportsbook promos and bonus bets for January 2026. Compare welcome offers and top bonuses from leading betting sites.

item.title: Wetzel: Let football be football. And let it snow.
item.description: Don't move football to climate controlled environments. Let football be football. And let it snow.

item.title: Four offseason lessons from two unlikely Super Bowl teams: Savvy moves for the Seahawks, Patriots
item.description: It's easy to be skeptical about big free agency spending, midtier QB contracts and defensive-minded coaches. But the Seahawks and Patriots proved ever...

item.title: Men's Bracketology: The Big Ten drought could (really, finally) end

item.title: Bracketology watch guide: Nebraska's biggest game ever, more at stake on Tuesday
